statement.p: Sketch the graph of a function {{fn}}(x) that meets all of the following criteria. Be sure to scale your axes and label any important features of your graph.

answer.p: Answers vary. Here are some things to check for:

ul.li: Does your graph represent a function? If your graph fails the vertical line test, it is not a function. This means there is more than one point on the graph with the same x-value, which is not allowed!
